entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
